title: Share of ethnic minorities in the China 's minority autonomous regions 2018
summary: This is a bar chart representing Province in the x axis and Share of ethnic minorities in the y axis.
The maximum Share of ethnic minorities 90.05 is found at Province Tibet and the minimum is found at Zhejiang where Province is 11.81.
The Share of ethnic minorities of Province Tibet is 7.62% larger than the minimum value at Zhejiang.
min_summary: This bar chart has 21 columns on the x axis representing Province, and Share of ethnic minorities in each Province on the y axis.
The Share of ethnic minorities is highest at Province Tibet and lowest at Province Zhejiang.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Province in the x axis and Share of ethnic minorities in the y axis.
The maximum Share of ethnic minorities 90.05 is found at Province Tibet and the minimum is found at Zhejiang where Province is 11.81.
The Share of ethnic minorities of Province Tibet is 7.62% larger than the minimum value at Zhejiang.
max_summary: This bar chart has 21 columns on the x axis representing Province, and Share of ethnic minorities in each Province on the y axis.
Province Tibet has the highest Share of ethnic minorities and Zhejiang has the lowest Share of ethnic minorities.
Province Hunan has the second highest value for Share of ethnic minorities.
Province Tibet has 7.62 times more Share of ethnic minorities than Province Zhejiang which is has the lowest.
Province Tibet is higher than any other Provinces with value 90.05, followed by Hunan, and Chongqing. Down to Province Zhejiang with the lowest value 11.81.
The Province Zhejiang has 1.7 times less Share of ethnic minorities than average.
